com.jswiff.swfrecords.tags
Class DoInitAction

java.lang.Object
  com.jswiff.swfrecords.tags.Tag
      com.jswiff.swfrecords.tags.DoInitAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class DoInitAction
extends Tag

This tag contains a series of initialization actions for a particular sprite. These actions are executed only once, before the first instatiation of the sprite. Typically used for class definitions.

This tag is used to implement the #initclip ActionScript compiler directive.

Since:
SWF 6
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

DoInitAction

public DoInitAction(int spriteId)
Creates a new DoInitAction tag. Supply the character ID of the sprite the initialization actions apply to. After creation, use addAction() to add actions to the contained action block.

Parameters:
spriteId - character ID of sprite to be initialized
Method Detail

addAction

public void addAction(Action action)
Adds an initialization action record.

Parameters:
action - init action record

getInitActions

public ActionBlock getInitActions()
Returns the action block containing the initialization action records. Use addAction() to add an action record to this block.

Returns:
initialization action block

getSpriteId

public int getSpriteId()
Returns the character ID of the sprite the initialization actions apply to.

Returns:
sprite's character ID

setSpriteId

public void setSpriteId(int spriteId)
Sets the character ID of the sprite the initialization actions apply to.

Parameters:
spriteId - sprite's character ID
